snippet: Harrington had a five-shot lead with 23 holes of the Indonesia Open remaining after Saturday’s third round was cut short by poor weather.
lead_paragraph: Harrington had a five-shot lead with 23 holes of the Indonesia Open remaining after Saturday’s third round was cut short by poor weather.

headline.main: Harrington in Position To End Four-Year Slump
headline.print_headline: Harrington in Position To End Four-Year Slump
